animeTitle: Doomsday for All: Me, Virus Monarch
otherNames: Doomsday for All: Me, Virus Monarch, Virus King, 全民末日：我，病毒君王
synopsis: The world is shrouded in doomsday. The entire doomsday world has become a cruel evolution game! This is the greatest opportunity and trial field for mankind, and also an amusement park for gods and demons! Chen Bai was reborn and returned to ten days before the doomsday! Directly injected with the zombie virus, awakened the SSS talent: the King of Viruses! Control the virus and start a unique evolutionary path!
